#summary Ways to get your Android Device ID

= Android ID =

The Market API requires a correct device ID. This page is meant to serve as a guide to how to identify that ID, but is as of yet incomplete and unverified


== On your phone ==
According to [http://developer.android.com/reference/android/telephony/TelephonyManager.html#getDeviceId%28%29 this] your device ID is "the IMEI for GSM and the MEID or ESN for CDMA phones"

== In an emulated device ==
